sentences.sContent: My main reason for subscribing to New Scientist is to keep abreast of advances in science.
sentences.sCn: 我订阅《新科学家》的主要原因是要跟上科学的进步。

synos.tran: 订阅；捐款；[经]认购；赞成；签署

trans.tranCn: 订阅；捐款；认购；赞成；签署
trans.tranOther: to pay money, usually once a year, to have copies of a newspaper or magazine sent to you, or to have some other service
